page.title: FourStar Fees Calculator
page.content: Calculate the impact of investment fees on your returns. See your T-Rex Score and understand how fees erode wealth over time.

page.title: Blog - FourStar Fees
page.content: Learn about investment fees, index funds vs. active management, 401(k) fees, and fee optimization strategies.

page.title: About - FourStar Fees
page.content: Learn about our mission to help investors understand the impact of fees on long-term investment returns.

page.title: Understanding the Hidden Impact of Investment Fees
page.content: Most investors underestimate how fees erode their returns over time. Learn about the true cost of investment fees and how they compound over decades.

page.title: Index Funds vs. Actively Managed Funds: The Fee Difference
page.content: Is the higher cost of active management worth it? See how fees differ between index funds and actively managed investments.

page.title: The Real Cost of 401(k) Fees: What You Need to Know
page.content: Your workplace retirement plan might be costing you more than you think. Learn how to identify and minimize 401(k) fees.

page.title: Fee Negotiation: How to Lower Your Investment Costs
page.content: Many investors don't realize that advisory fees can be negotiated. Learn effective strategies for reducing your investment costs.
